name: Kythbloods_Tweaks_and_Additions_for_Krastorio2
title: Kythbloods Tweaks and Additions for Krastorio 2
author: Kythblood
description: Tweaks some things in Krastorio 2 and adds some new features and tiers of buildings/equipment./nAll features and options can be toggled individually in the settings and are highly customizable. Also contains patches for a number of mods to make them fit Krastorio 2 better.
